item.title: Days 1-3 Out of 100.
item.description:
Day #1

Day 1, I did nothing at all. I only opened up obsidian (my note taking app) and just stared at it for 30-ish minutes before closing it and going to my bed to crochet and watch youtube.

Day 2-3

I did the same thing basically but I need to plan this out more if I actually want to learn Portuguese. So, I need a new plan.

The Old & New Plan

this section is to map out my new & old plans to make my learning more efficent.

The old plan:

The learning plan I didn’t follow.

  • Work on speaking & reading first.
  • Study for no more than 2.5h a day.
  • Take Breaks; to eat/drink whatnot.
  • Practice Listening 3rd, and Writing/Typing 4th.
  • Take notes as needed, dont be scared to ask questions (or for help.)

The NEW plan:

  • Join a community. (discord linked in Relevant Links section)
  • Be active in said community.
  • Look for a language exchange partner.
  • Take Notes ON PAPER.
  • Ask questions.
  • Use voice/video chats or livestreams to practice speaking.

Conclusion

to be efficent i needed a new plan. So I made one and scrapped my old/original plans of this challenge. I plan to commit to the new/current plans and try my best to actually learn.

If I do not get to my original Goal I cannot be too disapointed because it was only for a fun challenge to motivate me.

Much love, & peace out my friends.

Links

  • Discord Server
  • What Is A Language Exchange Partner, and how does it work?

item.title: Life Update #1
item.description:
Life Update #1

Happy Halloween everybody!! I hope it was great for you guys and gals. I’m excited to share some updates with y’all.

Updates

  • New Blog Theme: I’ve decided to switch to a new blog theme that I think will make the site look more modern and professional. It’s still a work in progress, but I’m excited to see how it turns out! Blog Theme Source
  • I Set Up My YT Channel: I’ve set up my YouTube channel and started uploading videos. Check it out! YouTube Channel

My Discord Server was NUKED.

I have since set my server up again, but 4 months ago My discord was compromised, by multiple users, they were able to access my whole account, while i had access. They only managed to nuke my main server however since it was on my account i do not know who did it, i was on a plane at the time my server was nuked. Again I have set it up again. IT IS PRIMARILY CODING FOCUSED.

Discord Server Invite

Thanks for reading everyone!

Thank you for taking the time to read my blog. I appreciate your support and feedback. If you have any questions or comments, feel free to reach out to me on my social media accounts or leave a comment below.

item.title: This Marks The Start of My 100 Day Journey
item.description:
This Marks The Start of My 100 Day Journey

The rare 2 posts in 1 day for this blog. OK, So this will work by updating every 5 days starting on Thursday nov. 06, 2025, (today).

I am learning Brazillian Portuguese, and Mandarin Chinese, However i will be focusing on Portuguese this year since im less advanced in that language.

Day 1: Thursday nov. 06, 2025.

  • Make a new folder in my obsidian vault.
  • Write my Goals in the first page + the learning plan I plan want to follow over 100 days.

Goals

The goals of this challenge are as follows.

  • In 100 days I should be able to call for help, order a coffee & food at a cafe, and have small talk, along with basic greetings. (basic survival Portuguese)
  • In 100 days I should be at a(n) A1 or A2 level.

Plan

The learning plan I will follow.

  • Work on speaking & reading first.
  • Study for no more than 2.5h a day.
  • Take Breaks; to eat/drink whatnot.
  • Practice Listening 3rd, and Writing/Typing 4th.
  • Take notes as needed, dont be scared to ask questions (or for help.)

Conclusion

My goal is to be able to survive for at least a week in brazil, will it be graceful? FUCK NO!! but it is part of the learning process.

Relevant Links

  • Twitter (for daily updates)

item.title: My First Stupid Linked List
item.description:
My First Stupid Linked List

Hi! I made a linked list. I have learned some things and I felt like sharing with the class that is my blog~

What I Learned…

So I learned some C++ and how to make a Linked List (obviously lmao), but what else could I have learned? I learned the difference between a “Heap” and a “Stack”.

What Is A Stack?

A “Stack” is a region of memory that stores

  • Local Variables
  • Function Paramaters
  • Return Addresses

It operates in a LIFO order.

LIFO = Last In, First Out.

What Is A Heap?

A “Heap” is a Larger Region of memory that is used for Dynamic Allocation. That means I decide to allocate and free memory basically.

Related Links.

  • GitHub Repo
  • Tutorial I Used

NOTE If links show up in plain text and not as a link they are either broken or not available!

item.title: First Post
item.description:
Welcome Home!

Hi!! Im so glad to have you here ‚ù§

About Me.

Hi there, If you don’t know me, I am Penelope, aka Penne_Not_Pasta!! I’m now blogging. Welcome to the shitshow that is my blog. I like to write so let’s see how this goes hahah.

so basically im Penne, I’m 17 & i use she/her pronouns. you can find me on any social platform (instagram, tiktok, spotify podcasts, Ko-Fi, discord, & even youtube!) I will soon have a podcast so stay tuned hehehe.

I am also starting the process to become catholic, it is called OCIA (formerly RCIA).

I love you guys!!

Peace~
